description:
The Great Aussie Waffle Log will be hitting shelves by the end of the month.
Australians rejoice, for the Polly Waffle, discontinued in 2009, will be returning to supermarket shelves soon.

Under a new name, "The Great Aussie Waffle Log" will be created by Chocolate Works which has spent the last nine months perfecting their recipe. 
"We just decided that nothing had come into the market to replace the Polly Waffle and realised that Nestle weren't going to bring it back, so we decided to have a crack at it," Managing Director of Chocolate Works told the Herald Sun.
Facebook: Bring
When the Polly Waffle was first discontinued, Aussie punters were left bidding upwards of $100 on eBay for the chocolate. Now, even the WRAPPERS are selling for $10.

ebay.com.au
A Facebook page was also started that is consistently updated with news on the lost confectionery.

Facebook: Bring
There's no word yet on what the advertising campaign for The Great Ausssie Waffle Log will be like, but it'll be hard to trump the Polly Waffle's original campaign.
youtube.com
View Entire List ›
title: A New Version Of The Polly Waffle Is Coming Back
